attributes.action: Fully renatonalise the NHS.Reinstate the bursaries for training nurses etc.
attributes.background:
This Government is privatising NHS by stealth, driving a culture of inefficiency as an excuse to continue.
The NHS belongs to the people of Britain.
This government is scrapping NHS bursaries for student nurses etc, a move that will weaken the NHS and cause a skills deficit for the UK.

rejection.details:
If you want the Government to keep NHS bursaries for student nurses, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/131998
